channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion Sizzling Top Offers
channel.desc: Let your summer wardrobe sizzle with our fantastic fashion offers.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Salon with SBC
channel.desc: SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Health & Wellbeing
channel.desc: Look after yourself with our showcase of exercise equipment, supplements, meal plans and other tools to help you maintain a healthy lifestyle.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tarte Cosmetics
channel.desc: This show features high performance natural products from Tarte Cosmetics, including everything from Amazonian clay to maracuja oil. Find a wide variety of glamorous eco-chic products you'll love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: One Time Only Offers
channel.desc: Join us for one hour of unbeatable offers - snap these up before they're gone.
